parser.usage:
UltraX, MDX compiler for MXDRV2
-------------------------------
Usage: python ultrax.py [filename] [] [] {option}
[filename]: Name of the input file
Options:
-F: Force MML compiling

error.undefined: Command {} at position {} in file {} is not defined.
error.note_below:
Note at Position {} : Pattern {} : Row {} went below minimum value
(Minimum is D#0)
